acm:certificateauthority.description: Filters access by certificateAuthority in the request. Can be used to restrict which Certificate Authorites certificates can be issued from

acm:certificatetransparencylogging.description: Filters access by certificateTransparencyLogging option in the request. Default 'ENABLED' if no key is present in the request

acm:domainnames.description: Filters access by domainNames in the request. This key can be used to restrict which domains can be in certificate requests

acm:keyalgorithm.description: Filters access by keyAlgorithm in the request

acm:validationmethod.description: Filters access by validationMethod in the request. Default 'EMAIL' if no key is present in the request

aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the presence of tag key-value pairs in the request

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access by the presence of tag keys in the request
